abilities.name: Blue Ray
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Vaporeon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
